tool_description: Chat with your content/documents via an AI chatbot, which currently supports PDF files, and more file types are coming soon (e.g. CSV, ePUB, docx, pptx, URL) 😄.
name: AskPDF
title: AskPDF

api_list.name: Stop Chat Room Agent (cancel the prompt)
api_list.description: Stop Chat Room Agent (cancel the prompt)

api_list.name: Clear chat room conversation history
api_list.description: Clear the chat room conversation history.

api_list.name: Upload document (e.g PDF)
api_list.description: Upload your document like a PDF, a chat room will be create / returned identified by a UUID

api_list.name: Register your OpenAI api key
api_list.description:
Register your OpenAI API key to be used with chat room in the back-end,

**Important Note:**
Register it only once, or when your OpenAI key changed.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://askpdf1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/openai-key/update"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "askpdf1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://askpdf1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/openai-key/update"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "askpdf1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Chat room
api_list.description: Send your / client question and you'll get an AI reply as a response
